title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - March 16th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - March 16th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring:-Sarah Frier on Facebook’s attempts to clean up toxic content-Jim Ellis on what’s next for Boeing-Lucas Shaw profiles China’s unlikely pop star-Plus, a conversation with Booking Holdings CEO Glenn Fogel

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
